name: primitive-alert
description: Alert banner with info/success/warning/error variants and optional dismiss button
postMessage:
Requires shadcn/ui setup: npx shadcn@latest init
Import: import { Alert, AlertTitle, AlertDescription } from '@/components/ui/alert'
Usage: <Alert variant='success' dismissible><AlertTitle>Done</AlertTitle><AlertDescription>Saved.</AlertDescription></Alert>
